entry.title: Re CBC is only open to members of Developer DAO and Macro, for now. Just head on over to cbc-start-here and react to the emoji to get the CBC role, yo...
entry.summary: Re CBC is only open to members of Developer DAO and Macro, for now. Just head on over to cbc-start-here and react to the emoji to get the CBC role, you should then see the other CBC-related channels. In the future, CBC will be fully open to any anon.
